entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then north 30 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023
